com.scalar.dl.ledger.contract

Class Contract

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.dl.ledger.contract.Contract
  • Deprecated. 
    This class will be package-private and won't be available to users in release 5.0.0.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class Contract
extends java.lang.Object
    An invokable contract which users can create their contracts based on.

public CertificateEntry.Key getCertificateKey()

      • invoke

        public abstract javax.json.JsonObject invoke(Ledger ledger,
                                             javax.json.JsonObject argument,
                                             java.util.Optional<javax.json.JsonObject> properties)
        Deprecated. 
        Invokes the contract to Ledger with the specified argument and the pre-registered contract properties. An implementation of the Contract should throw ContractContextException if it faces application-level contextual error (such as lack of balance in payment application).
        Parameters:
        ledger - tamper-evident ledger
        argument - json-formatted argument
        properties - json-formatted pre-registered contract properties
        Returns:
        json-formatted result

      • invoke

        protected final javax.json.JsonObject invoke(java.lang.String contractId,
                                             Ledger ledger,
                                             javax.json.JsonObject argument)
        Deprecated. 
        Invokes the specified contract to Ledger with the specified argument.
        Parameters:
        contractId - another contract to invoke
        ledger - tamper-evident ledger
        argument - json-formatted result
        Returns:
        json-formatted result
